record.title: AMENDING SENATE RESOLUTION 400 OF THE 94TH CONGRESS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 16, S. Res. 50.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
